diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+
+set -eu
+
+BASE_DIR="$(dirname "$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)")"
+TMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d)
+DEST="${TMP_DIR}/shield-recipe-client"
+
+mkdir -p $DEST
+
+# deletes the temp directory
+function cleanup {
+  rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"
+}
+trap cleanup EXIT
+
+while read -r LINE || [[ -n "${LINE}" ]]; do
+  mkdir -p "$(dirname "${DEST}/${LINE}")"
+  cp -r "${BASE_DIR}/${LINE}" "$(dirname "${DEST}/${LINE}")"
+done < "${BASE_DIR}/build-includes.txt"
+
+rm "${DEST}/install.rdf.in"
body_text: This is a part of the Firefox build process. We don't need it for the XPI build process.
body: This is a part of the Firefox build process. We don't need it for the XPI build process.
body_html: This is a part of the Firefox build process. We don't need it for the XPI build process.
